info.name: ZeresPluginLibrary
info.description: Gives other plugins utility functions and the ability to emulate v2.

changelog.title: New Stuff
items: **DiscordContextMenu API** is here for the developers. This should allow developers to easily create and add to context menus.

changelog.title: Improvements
items: **__Markdown__** is now supported in changelog and some other modals.
**Initialization sequence** is now more consistent and better at reloading plugins.

changelog.title: Bugs Squashed
items: **Leak Plugged.** Fixed some React leakage. (Thanks Lighty)
**Patch patched.** I patched the Patch where the Patch patched too much.
**Better Settings.** Fixed extend function not working properly for arrays.
